thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M02 06, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: A Middle Way to America’s Impending New 5G Network

author: wsjcom
title: A Middle Way to America’s Impending New 5G Network
text:
Regarding recent government discussion of a nationalized 5G network, it’s important to recognize that China has been building nationalized mobile broadband infrastructure for more than 15 years, and the huge scale of deployment has catapulted two Chinese vendors from obscurity to the top of the global telecom market (“Regulators Reject Idea Of a Nationalized 5G,” U.S. News, Jan. 30).
Meanwhile, the American government encourages competition, but we have reached a point where most American mobile-telecom suppliers are gone....
